channel.title: [MMORPG]Lunaria Story by R2Gamers[NO DL]
channel.description:
This is a MMORPG game similar to ChronoTales and all this simple MMOs.
I kind like this - you can AFK and receive bonuses etc. every couple weeks a new server is up. No need to download. I am in in Server 46, my Guild is ranked in the top 10 - hopefully soon to be top 5.
You guys are welcome to play this game - would be more happy if you join my server.
http://ls.r2games.com/
[img]https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSMSjzptZMq_1YSNu8mctKk1U0X4Zle30Pt3Stu3j8DGqQEWWPbaA[/img]
